mapper.update: update activity set activity_name = #{activity.name}, apply_start_time = #{activity.applyStartTime}, apply_end_time = #{activity.applyEndTime}, feedback_start_time = #{activity.feedbackStartTime}, feedback_end_time = #{activity.feedbackEndTime}, creator = #{activity.creator}, create_time = #{activity.createTime}, content = #{activity.content}, activity_file_path = #{activity.filePath}, location = #{activity.location} where activity_id = #{activity.id};
mapper.select: select * from activity where ${column} like concat(concat('%',#{key}),'%') limit #{begin},#{num}
